document.full_text: johnson & johnson has agreed to buy the medical equipment maker synthes for $21.3 billion in cash and stock, in one of the biggest deals ever in the health care sector.
document.title: j.&j. to buy synthes for $21.3 billion
lines_and_colors: johnson & johnson has agreed to buy the medical equipment maker synthes for $21.3 billion in cash and stock, in one of the biggest deals ever in the health care sector.
